no-canvas-support: It looks like your browser does not support Canvas API
game-explanation: You are a hunter looking for gold bars in a dungeon full of dangers and enemies, armed with your bow and arrows you will have to make your way through these dangers to achieve your goal and survive.
game-explanation2: To survive in your journey you have to take into account the following warnings:
rule1: The wumpus emits a stench that you can notice one square around it.
rule2: There are bottomless pits in which you can feel its breeze one square around it.
rule3: The ingots are made of the purest gold that's why you can see its shine in a square around it.
rule4: If you fall into a pit or trip over a wumpus you will lose the game.
